tourist-groups.title: Special offer for Tourist Groups
tourist-groups.offer:
For groups more than 10 persons, 2 sets are for FREE!

Taiwaya restaurant is able to serve a group max. of 35 people at a time

Booking via phone +37258805056 (at least 30 minutes before coming)

Booking via email info@thaifood.ee or Facebook (at least 3-4 hours in advance)
tourist-groups.set1:
Set N1 - 16 €

* Laib pork - spicy (optional) pork salad

* Tom yum Gai - spicy coconut milk soup with chicken

* jasmine rice

+ water
tourist-groups.set2:
Set N2 - 22 €

* Larb Beef - spicy beef salad

*Tom Jum Goong - national Thai shrimp soup

* Fried vegetables with oyster sauce

* jasmine rice

* Sago dessert with coconut milk and melon

+ water
